5200/A0/04/802/003.status_value: Approved. The Law on the Handling of Administrative Violations was approved by the National Assembly in June 2012. It incorporates specific provisions to protect the rights of boys and girls in contact with the law  including recognition of the principle of the best interest of the child  detention in reform school as measure of last resort  the introduction of diversionary measures  and court procedure for placement of children in reform school in place of the current administrative mechanism.

5200/A0/04/802/003.headline: The legal framework on justice for children has been improved  law enforcement and judicial institutions have been strengthened and the capacity of justice sector personnel has been strengthened  contributing to better support and protection for children in contact with the law.

5200/A0/04/802/003.status_value: The Law on People's Court Organization was passed by the National Assembly  creating Viet Nam's first ever specialised children's court. With this new court  children will no longer have to attend adult courts  and their matters will be handled by specialised Judges and Court Officers that apply child and gender sensitive procedures and processes.
